list.question: Are all products on AgriBharat original?
list.answer: Yes, we sell only 100% original and branded agricultural products.

list.question: Do you provide a bill with the purchase?
list.answer: Yes, every order comes with a proper GST invoice.

list.question: Can I pay after receiving the order at home?
list.answer: We offer both secure online payment and Cash on Delivery (COD) options.

list.question: Can I get expert farming advice?
list.answer: Yes, we have Agri experts available who provide instant guidance for your farming needs.

list.question: What if I receive the wrong product or damaged material?
list.answer: You can call our Agri expert helpline and register your complaint. We will resolve it promptly.

testimonial1.name: Prashant Jogiya
testimonial1.message: Healthy wines, bright yellow flowers, round fruits on every leaf, lots of sweet melons, easy storage for transportation, and good market price; what else can a farmer expect? Thank You AgroGenie

testimonial2.name: Rahul Mangroliya
testimonial2.message: First time tried Gem One Watermelon, it also grows trust in their other products like Tomato, Capsicum, and Chilli. Avval quality and good response in the market with the fruits

testimonial3.name: Pankaj Bhesaniya
testimonial3.message: AgroGenie has made a huge contribution to my success. Perfect blend of quality seeds, perfect package of practices and quick response; acts as a true friend of farmers

testimonial4.name: Alkeshbhai Makani
testimonial4.message: Castor Seeds germinated quickly, and the plants grew strong against pests and diseases. There was no incidence of pod shattering, and the spikes were 4-5 feet long

testimonial5.name: Pareshbhai Lakhani
testimonial5.message: As per the name, they are actually doing magic in their seeds. Coriander seeds are packed with a seed treatment, which gives a boost in germination time and percentage, and seeds grow magically

testimonial6.name: Karshanbhai
testimonial6.message: Saw Soybean variety Sardaar, limited growth, full flowering, more than 100 pods, matured seeds in every pod, leads to the best yield. I was at the top for higher production due to AgroGenie

testimonial7.name: Jentibhai Zalavadiya
testimonial7.message: Sales after service is the best part I liked about AgroGenie. Supporting with the technical knowledge makes the farmer win the game of high yield and better quality

testimonial8.name: Bhautik Hidad
testimonial8.message: Happy to see the plants full of pods with two and three seeds in it. The resistance power against pest-disease is impressive and give very good yield in the adverse weather

testimonial9.name: Bhavesh Gadhiya
testimonial9.message: As a progressive farmer, I used to try new seeds and share experiance to fellow farmers. After accepting this seeds, even more farmers asking from where I'm getting the quality seeds

testimonial10.name: Gordhanbhai Savaliya
testimonial10.message: This season, I used AgroGenie seeds and could clearly see the difference, from strong germination to green plant, and early flowering to good harvest.

advisor_contact_success: Our Advisor will contact you soon.
